description.value:
Immediately after the Crash, deep in the warrens of Absalom Station, space goblins discovered a tiny rupture to the Drift emitting a strange, purplish slime. Physical contact with this slime was found to cause a pleasant, calming euphoria. While this “mood goo” dries after a minute, it can be stored under pressure. The goblins immediately packed this self-replicating substance into insulation foam sprayers and started selling them as riot control gear.

Capacity: 10
